name: Ashes of the Abhorrent
text:
Players can't cast spells from graveyards or activate abilities of cards in graveyards.
Whenever a creature dies, you gain 1 life.
flavor: "Let no trace of the vampires' foulness remain."

rulings.text: Activated abilities contain a colon. They’re generally written “[Cost]: [Effect].” Some keyword abilities (such as embalm from the Amonkhet set) are activated abilities and will have colons in their reminder text. Triggered abilities (starting with “when,” “whenever,” or “at”) are unaffected by Ashes of the Abhorrent.
Ashes of the Abhorrent doesn’t stop players from playing land cards from the graveyard if an effect allows them to do so.
If a creature dies at the same time that Ashes of the Abhorrent is destroyed, you’ll gain 1 life.

name: Axis of Mortality
text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may have two target players exchange life totals.
flavor: The Church of Dusk teaches there is no gain without loss, no triumph without sacrifice, no drink of exquisite crimson without a dying gasp.

rulings.text: If one of the targeted players is an illegal target when the triggered ability of Axis of Mortality tries to resolve, the exchange won’t happen. Neither player’s life total will change.

When the life totals are exchanged, each player gains or loses the amount of life necessary to equal the other player’s previous life total. For example, if player A has 5 life and player B has 3 life before the exchange, player A will lose 2 life and player B will gain 2 life. Replacement effects may modify these gains and losses, and triggered abilities may trigger on them.

If a player can’t gain life, that player can’t exchange life totals with a player with a higher life total. If a player can’t lose life, that player can’t exchange life totals with a player with a lower life total. In either of these cases, neither player’s life total will change.

In a Two-Headed Giant game, each player is considered to have the same life total as their team. If the two targeted players are on different teams, those players gain or lose the appropriate amount of life so that the teams end up exchanging life totals. If the two targeted players are teammates, they can’t exchange life totals.

name: Bellowing Aegisaur
text: Enrage — Whenever Bellowing Aegisaur is dealt damage, put a +1/+1 counter on each other creature you control.
flavor: Its roaring challenge is punctuated by the slam of its tail on the earth, rousing the herds of the plains.

rulings.text: If another creature you control is dealt lethal damage at the same time that Bellowing Aegisaur is dealt damage, the other creature won’t be saved by the +1/+1 counter that would have been put on it.
If multiple sources deal damage to a creature with an enrage ability at the same time, most likely because multiple creatures blocked that creature, the enrage ability triggers only once.

If lethal damage is dealt to a creature with an enrage ability, that ability triggers. The creature with that enrage ability leaves the battlefield before that ability resolves, so it won’t be affected by the resolving ability.

name: Emissary of Sunrise
text:
First strike
When Emissary of Sunrise enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Once an ability that causes a creature to explore begins to resolve, no player may take any other actions until it’s done. Notably, opponents can’t try to remove the exploring creature after you reveal a nonland card but before it receives a counter.
If no card is revealed, most likely because that player’s library is empty, the exploring creature receives a +1/+1 counter.

If a resolving spell or ability instructs a specific creature to explore but that creature has left the battlefield, the creature still explores. If you reveal a nonland card this way, you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on anything, but you may put the revealed card into your graveyard. Effects that trigger “whenever a creature you control explores” trigger if appropriate.

name: Ixalan's Binding
text:
When Ixalan's Binding enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Ixalan's Binding leaves the battlefield.
Your opponents can't cast spells with the same name as the exiled card.
flavor: Jace awoke to the certainty that he was lost.

rulings.text: Auras attached to the exiled permanent will be put into their owners’ graveyards. Any Equipment will become unattached and remain on the battlefield. Any counters on the exiled permanent will cease to exist.
If a token is exiled this way, it will cease to exist and won’t return to the battlefield.
The exiled card returns to the battlefield immediately after Ixalan’s Binding leaves the battlefield. Nothing happens between the two events, including state-based actions.
If Ixalan’s Binding leaves the battlefield before its triggered ability resolves, the target permanent won’t be exiled.
If the exiled card is a land card that’s become a nonland permanent, Ixalan’s Binding won’t stop players from playing lands with that name.

If there is no exiled card (perhaps because the exiled permanent was a token or was a commander that moved to the command zone in the Commander variant), Ixalan’s Binding won’t stop players from casting spells.

In a multiplayer game, if Ixalan’s Binding’s owner leaves the game and another player owns the exiled card, the exiled card will return to the battlefield under its owner’s control. Because the one-shot effect that returns the card isn’t an ability that goes on the stack, it won’t cease to exist along with the leaving player’s spells and abilities on the stack.
If the exiled card has a different name in exile than it did on the battlefield, Ixalan’s Binding stops players from casting spells with the name of that card as it exists in exile.

There are many important moments in the story, but the most crucial—called “story spotlights”—are shown on cards. These cards have the Planeswalker symbol in their text box; this symbol has no effect on gameplay. You can read more about these events in the official Magic fiction at http://www.mtgstory.com.

foreignNames.name: Узы Иксалана
foreignNames.text:
Когда Узы Иксалана выходят на поле битвы, изгоните целевой не являющийся землей перманент под контролем оппонента до тех пор, пока Узы Иксалана не покинут поле битвы.
Ваши оппоненты не могут разыгрывать заклинания с таким же именем, как у изгнанной карты.
foreignNames.flavor: Джейс очнулся с ясным пониманием того, что потерялся.

foreignNames.name: 依夏兰的束缚
foreignNames.text:
当依夏兰的束缚进战场时，放逐目标由对手操控的非地永久物，直到依夏兰的束缚离开战场为止。
所有对手都不能施放与所放逐的牌同名之咒语。
foreignNames.flavor: 杰斯醒转过来后，发现自己脑中一片空白。

foreignNames.name: 依夏蘭的束縛
foreignNames.text:
當依夏蘭的束縛進戰場時，放逐目標由對手操控的非地永久物，直到依夏蘭的束縛離開戰場為止。
所有對手都不能施放與所放逐的牌同名之咒語。
foreignNames.flavor: 傑斯醒轉過來後，發現自己腦中一片空白。

originalText:
When Ixalan's Binding enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Ixalan's Binding leaves the battlefield.
Your opponents can't cast spells with the same name as the exiled card.

name: Kinjalli's Caller
text: Dinosaur spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
flavor: The people of the Sun Empire worship the sun in three aspects. Kinjalli is the Wakening Sun, who created humans from clay and baked them in the sun's warmth.

rulings.text: To determine the total cost of a Dinosaur spell, start with the mana cost or alternative cost you’re paying, add any cost increases, then apply any cost reductions. The converted mana cost of the creature remains unchanged, no matter what the total cost to cast it was.

If an effect refers to a “[subtype] spell” or “[subtype] card,” it refers only to a spell or card that has that subtype. For example, March of the Drowned is a card that benefits Pirates and features Pirates in its illustration, but it isn’t a Pirate card.

foreignNames.name: Kinjallis Ruferin
foreignNames.text: Dinosaurier-Zaubersprüche, die du wirkst, kosten beim Wirken {1} weniger.
foreignNames.flavor: Das Volk des Imperiums der Sonne verehrt dreierlei Aspekte der Sonne. Kinjalli ist die Erwachende Sonne, die die Menschen aus Ton geformt und in den Strahlen der Sonne gebrannt hat.

foreignNames.name: Invocadora de Kinjalli
foreignNames.text: Te cuesta {1} menos lanzar los hechizos de Dinosaurio.
foreignNames.flavor: El pueblo del Imperio del Sol venera los tres aspectos del sol. Kinjalli es el Sol Albo, que creó a los humanos del barro y los coció en su calor.

foreignNames.name: Meneuse de Kinjalli
foreignNames.text: Les sorts de dinosaure que vous lancez coûtent {1} de moins à lancer.
foreignNames.flavor: Le peuple de l'Empire du Soleil voue un culte aux trois aspects solaires. Kinjalli est le Soleil levant, celui qui a façonné les humains dans de l'argile et les a cuits sous sa chaleur.

foreignNames.name: Evocatrice di Kinjalli
foreignNames.text: Le magie Dinosauro che lanci costano {1} in meno per essere lanciate.
foreignNames.flavor: Il popolo dell'Impero del Sole venera questo astro nei suoi tre aspetti. Kinjalli è il Sole Sorgente, che creò gli umani dalla creta cotta nel suo calore.

foreignNames.name: キンジャーリの呼び手
foreignNames.text: あなたが恐竜・呪文を唱えるためのコストは{1}少なくなる。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・クレリック
foreignNames.flavor: 太陽帝国では三相の太陽が崇拝されている。キンジャーリは覚醒の太陽。土くれを太陽の熱で焼き固め、人間を作ったとされる。

foreignNames.name: 킨잘리의 소환사
foreignNames.text: 당신이 발동하는 공룡 주문들은 발동하는 데 {1}이 덜 든다.
foreignNames.flavor: 태양 제국 사람들은 태양의 세 가지 모습을 숭배한다. 킨잘리는 인간을 찰흙으로 빚고 태양의 온기로 구운 일깨우는 태양이다.

foreignNames.name: Convocadora de Kinjalli
foreignNames.text: As mágicas de Dinossauro que você conjura custam {1} a menos para serem conjuradas.
foreignNames.flavor: O povo do Império do Sol cultua o sol em três aspectos. Kinjalli é o Sol Nascente, que criou os humanos a partir do barro e os cozinhou ao calor do sol.

foreignNames.name: Призывательница Кинхалли
foreignNames.text: Разыгрываемые вами заклинания Динозавров стоят на {1} меньше.
foreignNames.flavor: Жители Империи Солнца поклоняются солнцу в трех его ипостасях. Кинхалли — Пробуждающее Солнце, создавшее людей из глины и высушившее их своими лучами.

foreignNames.name: 津加理唤师
foreignNames.text: 你施放的恐龙咒语减少{1}来施放。
foreignNames.flavor: 烈阳帝国人民崇敬烈阳三相。晓阳之相名唤津加理，抟土造人，呵护醒生。

foreignNames.name: 津加理喚師
foreignNames.text: 你施放的恐龍咒語減少{1}來施放。
foreignNames.flavor: 烈陽帝國人民崇敬烈陽三相。曉陽之相名喚津加理，摶土造人，呵護醒生。

originalText: Dinosaur spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.

name: Kinjalli's Sunwing
text:
Flying
Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.
flavor:
"There are moments when I feel I could fly like the sunwing. Far away I would soar, but always a golden gale pushes me back."
—Huatli

rulings.text: If a creature an opponent controls enters the battlefield at the same time that Kinjalli’s Sunwing enters the battlefield under your control, Kinjalli’s Sunwing’s effect doesn’t apply to your opponent’s creature.

foreignNames.name: Kinjallis Sonnenschwinge
foreignNames.text:
Fliegend
Kreaturen, die deine Gegner kontrollieren, kommen getappt ins Spiel.
foreignNames.flavor: „Manchmal spüre ich den Wunsch, zu fliegen wie eine Sonnenschwinge. Es zieht mich in die Ferne, doch ein goldener Wind hält mich zurück." —Huatli

foreignNames.name: Alasolar de Kinjalli
foreignNames.text:
Vuela.
Las criaturas que controlan tus oponentes entran al campo de batalla giradas.
foreignNames.flavor: "Hay momentos que sueño que vuelo como un alasolar. Alzaría el vuelo y me iría lejos, muy lejos de aquí... pero siempre me empuja de vuelta un vendaval dorado". —Huatli

foreignNames.name: Solaile de Kinjalli
foreignNames.text:
Vol
Les créatures que vos adversaires contrôlent arrivent sur le champ de bataille engagées.
foreignNames.flavor: « J'ai parfois l'impression de pouvoir voler comme un solaile. Je pourrais m'envoler haut et loin, mais un souffle d'or me repousse toujours. » —Huatli

foreignNames.name: Ala Solare di Kinjalli
foreignNames.text:
Volare
Le creature controllate dai tuoi avversari entrano nel campo di battaglia TAPpate.
foreignNames.flavor: "Sento talvolta che potrei volare come l'ala solare. Vorrei librarmi verso terre lontane, ma sempre una raffica dorata mi sospinge indietro." —Huatli

foreignNames.name: キンジャーリの陽光翼
foreignNames.text:
飛行
対戦相手がコントロールしているクリーチャーはタップ状態で戦場に出る。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 恐竜
foreignNames.flavor: 「ときどき、陽光翼みたいに飛べる気がする。どこまでも高く飛んで。でも必ず金色の突風に押し戻されるのよ。」 ――ファートリ

foreignNames.name: 킨잘리의 태양날개
foreignNames.text:
비행
당신의 상대들이 조종하는 생물들은 탭된 채로 전장에 들어온다.
foreignNames.flavor: "태양날개처럼 날 수 있을 듯한 기분이 들 때가 있어. 저 멀리 날아오르려 해도 항상 금빛 돌풍이 날 밀어내지." —화틀리

foreignNames.name: Asa-solar de Kinjalli
foreignNames.text:
Voar
As criaturas que seus oponentes controlam entram no campo de batalha viradas.
foreignNames.flavor: "Há momentos em que eu sinto que poderia voar como o asa-solar. Para longe eu alçaria voo, mas um vendaval dourado sempre me arrasta de volta." — Huatli

foreignNames.name: Солнцекрыл Кинхалли
foreignNames.text:
Полет
Существа под контролем ваших оппонентов выходят на поле битвы повернутыми.
foreignNames.flavor: «Иногда я чувствую, что могу взлететь, подобно солнцекрылу. Я полетела бы в бескрайнюю даль... но золотой ветер отбрасывает меня назад». — Уатли

foreignNames.name: 津加理旭翼龙
foreignNames.text:
飞行
由对手操控的生物须横置进战场。
foreignNames.flavor: 「有时我觉得自己如同旭翼龙加身，能够畅翔蓝天。虽然直上云霄，但总有一股金色强风将我压回。」 ～华特莉

foreignNames.name: 津加理旭翼龍
foreignNames.text:
飛行
由對手操控的生物須橫置進戰場。
foreignNames.flavor: 「有時我覺得自己如同旭翼龍加身，能夠暢翔藍天。雖然直上雲霄，但總有一股金色強風將我壓回。」 ～華特莉

originalText:
Flying
Creatures your opponents control enter the battlefield tapped.

name: Legion Conquistador
text: When Legion Conquistador enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards named Legion Conquistador, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor: The Legion of Dusk sailed from Torrezon in search of glory, riches, and the Immortal Sun.

foreignNames.name: Konquistador der Legion
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Konquistador der Legion ins Spiel kommt, kannst du deine Bibliothek nach einer beliebigen Anzahl an Karten namens Konquistador der Legion durchsuchen, sie offen vorzeigen, auf deine Hand nehmen und dann deine Bibliothek mischen.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Legion des Zwielichts begab sich von Torrezon aus auf die Suche nach Ruhm, Reichtümern und der Immerwährenden Sonne.

foreignNames.name: Conquistador de la Legión
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Conquistador de la Legión entre al campo de batalla, puedes buscar en tu biblioteca cualquier cantidad de cartas llamadas Conquistador de la Legión, mostrarlas, ponerlas en tu mano y luego barajar tu biblioteca.
foreignNames.flavor: Las carabelas de la Legión del Crepúsculo partieron de Torrezón en busca de gloria, riqueza y el Sol Inmortal.

foreignNames.name: Conquistador de la Légion
foreignNames.text: Quand le Conquistador de la Légion arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous pouvez chercher dans votre bibliothèque n'importe quel nombre de cartes appelées Conquistador de la Légion, les révéler, les mettre dans votre main et mélanger ensuite votre bibliothèque.
foreignNames.flavor: La Légion du crépuscule prit la mer à Torrezon en quête de gloire, de richesses, et du Soleil immortel.

foreignNames.name: Conquistador della Legione
foreignNames.text: Quando il Conquistador della Legione entra nel campo di battaglia, puoi passare in rassegna il tuo grimorio per un qualsiasi numero di carte chiamate Conquistador della Legione, rivelarle, aggiungerle alla tua mano e poi rimescolare il tuo grimorio.
foreignNames.flavor: La Legione del Vespro salpò da Torrezon in cerca di gloria, ricchezze e del Sole Immortale.

foreignNames.name: 軍団の征服者
foreignNames.text: 軍団の征服者が戦場に出たとき、あなたはあなたのライブラリーから、望む枚数の「軍団の征服者」という名前のカードを探してもよい。そうしたなら、それらを公開してあなたの手札に加え、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 吸血鬼・兵士
foreignNames.flavor: 薄暮の軍団はトレゾンから海を渡り、栄光と富と不滅の太陽を探しに来る。

foreignNames.name: 군단 정복자
foreignNames.text: 군단 정복자가 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 당신의 서고에서 이름이 군단 정복자인 카드를 원하는 수만큼 찾아 공개한 후, 당신의 손으로 가져갈 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 당신의 서고를 섞는다.
foreignNames.flavor: 황혼의 군단은 영광과 재화, 그리고 불멸의 태양을 찾아 토레존에서 항해해 왔다.

foreignNames.name: Conquistador da Legião
foreignNames.text: Quando Conquistador da Legião entra no campo de batalha, você pode procurar qualquer número de cards em seu grimório com o nome Conquistador da Legião, revelá-los, colocá-los na sua mão e depois embaralhar seu grimório.
foreignNames.flavor: A Legião do Crepúsculo zarpou do Torrezon em busca de glória, de riqueza e do Sol Imortal.

foreignNames.name: Конкистадор Легиона
foreignNames.text: Когда Конкистадор Легиона выходит на поле битвы, вы можете найти в вашей библиотеке любое количество карт с именем Конкистадор Легиона, показать их, положить их в вашу руку, затем перетасовать вашу библиотеку.
foreignNames.flavor: Легион Заката отплыл из Торресона в поисках славы, сокровищ и Бессмертного Солнца.

foreignNames.name: 军团征服者
foreignNames.text: 当军团征服者进战场时，你可以从你的牌库中搜寻任意数量名称为军团征服者的牌，展示这些牌，将它们置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 暮影军团从图瑞琮起航，离乡寻找荣耀、财富与永生圣阳的下落。

foreignNames.name: 軍團征服者
foreignNames.text: 當軍團征服者進戰場時，你可以從你的牌庫中搜尋任意數量名稱為軍團征服者的牌，展示這些牌，將它們置於你手上，然後將你的牌庫洗牌。
foreignNames.flavor: 暮影軍團從圖瑞琮起航，離鄉尋找榮耀、財富與永生聖陽的下落。

originalText: When Legion Conquistador enters the battlefield, you may search your library for any number of cards named Legion Conquistador, reveal them, put them into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Legion's Judgment
text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.
flavor: "My lance was once wielded by Venerable Tarrian. In his name and by his might, I cast you down!"

foreignNames.name: Richtspruch der Legion
foreignNames.text: Zerstöre eine Kreatur deiner Wahl mit Stärke 4 oder mehr.
foreignNames.flavor: „Einst führte der Altehrwürdige Tarrian meine Lanze. Mit seiner Stärke und in seinem Namen strecke ich dich nieder!"

foreignNames.name: Juicio de la Legión
foreignNames.text: Destruye la criatura objetivo con fuerza de 4 o más.
foreignNames.flavor: "El venerable Tarrian blandió mi lanza hace tiempo. En su nombre y por su poder, ¡yo te expulso!".

foreignNames.name: Jugement selon la Légion
foreignNames.text: Détruisez une créature de force supérieure ou égale à 4 ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor: « Ma lance appartenait autrefois au Vénérable Tarrian. En son nom et par sa puissance, je te condamne ! »

foreignNames.name: Giudizio della Legione
foreignNames.text: Distruggi una creatura bersaglio con forza pari o superiore a 4.
foreignNames.flavor: "Un tempo, la mia lancia fu impugnata dal Venerabile Tarrian. È nel suo nome e in virtù della sua potenza che ti anniento!"

foreignNames.name: 軍団の裁き
foreignNames.text: パワーが４以上のクリーチャー１体を対象とし、それを破壊する。
foreignNames.flavor: 「この槍はかつて尊者タリアンが使っていたものだ。その名と力に懸けて、貴様を倒す！」

foreignNames.name: 군단의 심판
foreignNames.text: 공격력이 4 이상인 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물을 파괴한다.
foreignNames.flavor: "내 창은 한때 가경자 타리안 님이 휘두르셨던 창이다. 그분의 이름과 힘으로, 네놈을 찍어누르겠다!"

foreignNames.name: Julgamento da Legião
foreignNames.text: Destrua a criatura alvo com poder igual ou superior a 4.
foreignNames.flavor: "Minha lança já foi empunhada pelo Venerável Tarrian. Em nome dele, pelo poder dele, eu o esconjuro!"

foreignNames.name: Правосудие Легиона
foreignNames.text: Уничтожьте целевое существо с силой 4 или больше.
foreignNames.flavor: «Когда-то мое копье принадлежало преподобному Тарриану. Его именем и его могуществом я поражу тебя!»

foreignNames.name: 军团裁决
foreignNames.text: 消灭目标力量等于或大于4的生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「这柄长枪曾是圣塔理安手中兵器。以彼之名，借彼之力，夺你性命！」

foreignNames.name: 軍團裁決
foreignNames.text: 消滅目標力量等於或大於4的生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 「這柄長槍曾是聖塔理安手中兵器。以彼之名，借彼之力，奪你性命！」

originalText: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater.

name: Legion's Landing // Adanto, the First Fort
text:
When Legion's Landing enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.
When you attack with three or more creatures, transform Legion's Landing.
flavor:
"I claim this land in the name of the queen."
—Adrian Adanto of Lujio

rulings.text: Once you’ve attacked with three or more creatures, Legion’s Landing will transform even if some of those creatures leave the battlefield or are removed from combat.
The last ability of Legion’s Landing only counts creatures that you declare as attacking creatures. Creatures that enter the battlefield attacking won’t count.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Ixalan mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/ixalan-mechanics).

foreignNames.name: Landung der Legion // Adanto, das erste Fort
foreignNames.text:
Wenn die Landung der Legion ins Spiel kommt, erzeuge einen 1/1 weißen Vampir-Kreaturenspielstein mit Lebensverknüpfung.
Wenn du mit drei oder mehr Kreaturen angreifst, transformiere die Landung der Legion.
foreignNames.flavor:
„Im Namen der Königin nehme ich dieses Land in Besitz."
—Adrian Adanto von Lujio

foreignNames.name: Desembarco de la Legión // Adanto, la primera fortaleza
foreignNames.text:
Cuando el Desembarco de la Legión entre al campo de batalla, crea una ficha de criatura Vampiro blanca 1/1 con la habilidad de vínculo vital.
Cuando ataques con tres o más criaturas, transforma el Desembarco de la Legión.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Reivindico esta tierra en nombre de la reina".
—Adrián Adanto de Lujio

foreignNames.name: Débarquement de la Légion // Adanto, le premier fort
foreignNames.text:
Quand le Débarquement de la Légion arrive sur le champ de bataille, créez un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche Vampire avec le lien de vie.
Quand vous attaquez avec au moins trois créatures, transformez le Débarquement de la Légion.
foreignNames.flavor:
« Je revendique cette terre au nom de la reine. »
—Adrian Adanto de Lujio

foreignNames.name: Sbarco della Legione // Adanto, il Primo Forte
foreignNames.text:
Quando lo Sbarco della Legione entra nel campo di battaglia, crea una pedina creatura Vampiro 1/1 bianca con legame vitale.
Quando attacchi con tre o più creature, trasforma lo Sbarco della Legione.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Rivendico queste terre nel nome della Regina."
—Adrian Adanto di Lujio

foreignNames.name: 軍団の上陸 // 一番砦、アダント
foreignNames.text:
軍団の上陸が戦場に出たとき、絆魂を持つ白の１/１の吸血鬼・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。
あなたがクリーチャー３体以上で攻撃したとき、軍団の上陸を変身させる。
foreignNames.flavor:
「女王陛下の名において、この地を領有する。」
――ルージオのエイドリアン・アダント

foreignNames.name: 군단의 상륙 // 최초의 요새, 아단토
foreignNames.text:
군단의 상륙이 전장에 들어올 때, 생명연결을 가진 1/1 백색 흡혈귀 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
당신이 세 개 이상의 생물로 공격할 때, 군단의 상륙을 변신시킨다.
foreignNames.flavor:
"여왕님의 이름으로, 이 땅의 주인이 되었음을 선포한다."
—루지오의 아드리안 아단토

foreignNames.name: Desembarque da Legião // Adanto, o Primeiro Forte
foreignNames.text:
Quando Desembarque da Legião entrar no campo de batalha, crie uma ficha de criatura branca 1/1 do tipo Vampiro com vínculo com a vida.
Quando você atacar com três ou mais criaturas, transforme Desembarque da Legião.
foreignNames.flavor:
"Tomo posse desta terra em nome da rainha."
— Adrian Adanto, de Lujio

foreignNames.name: Высадка Легиона // Аданто, Первый Форт
foreignNames.text:
Когда Высадка Легиона выходит на поле битвы, создайте одну фишку существа 1/1 белый Вампир с Цепью жизни.
Когда вы атакуете тремя или более существами, трансформируйте Высадку Легиона.
foreignNames.flavor:
«Именем королевы я объявляю эту землю нашей».
— Адриан Аданто из Лухио

foreignNames.name: 军团登陆 // 首砦艾唐托
foreignNames.text:
当军团登陆进战场时，派出一个1/1白色，具系命异能的吸血鬼衍生生物。
当你以三个或更多生物攻击时，转化军团登陆。
foreignNames.flavor:
「我以女王之名占领此地。」
～卢吉奥的安卓恩艾唐托

foreignNames.name: 軍團登陸 // 首砦艾唐托
foreignNames.text:
當軍團登陸進戰場時，派出一個1/1白色，具繫命異能的吸血鬼衍生生物。
當你以三個或更多生物攻擊時，轉化軍團登陸。
foreignNames.flavor:
「我以女王之名佔領此地。」
～盧吉奧的安卓恩艾唐托

originalText:
When Legion's Landing enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.
When you attack with three or more creatures, transform Legion's Landing.

name: Legion's Landing // Adanto, the First Fort
text:
(Transforms from Legion's Landing.)
{T}: Add {W}.
{2}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

rulings.text: Once you’ve attacked with three or more creatures, Legion’s Landing will transform even if some of those creatures leave the battlefield or are removed from combat.
The last ability of Legion’s Landing only counts creatures that you declare as attacking creatures. Creatures that enter the battlefield attacking won’t count.
For more information on double-faced cards, see the Ixalan mechanics article (http://magic.wizards.com/en/articles/archive/feature/ixalan-mechanics).

foreignNames.name: Landung der Legion // Adanto, das erste Fort
foreignNames.text:
(Transformierte Landung der Legion.)
{T}: Erhöhe deinen Manavorrat um {W}.
{2}{W}, {T}: Erzeuge einen 1/1 weißen Vampir-Kreaturenspielstein mit Lebensverknüpfung.

foreignNames.name: Desembarco de la Legión // Adanto, la primera fortaleza
foreignNames.text:
(Se transforma del Desembarco de la Legión.)
{T}: Agrega {W} a tu reserva de maná.
{2}{W}, {T}: Crea una ficha de criatura Vampiro blanca 1/1 con la habilidad de vínculo vital.

foreignNames.name: Débarquement de la Légion // Adanto, le premier fort
foreignNames.text:
(Transformation du Débarquement de la Légion.)
{T} : Ajoutez {W} à votre réserve.
{2}{W}, {T} : Créez un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche Vampire avec le lien de vie.

foreignNames.name: Sbarco della Legione // Adanto, il Primo Forte
foreignNames.text:
(Si trasforma dallo Sbarco della Legione.)
{T}: Aggiungi {W} alla tua riserva di mana.
{2}{W}, {T}: Crea una pedina creatura Vampiro 1/1 bianca con legame vitale.

foreignNames.name: 軍団の上陸 // 一番砦、アダント
foreignNames.text:
（軍団の上陸から変身する。）
{T}：あなたのマナ・プールに{W}を加える。
{2}{W}, {T}：絆魂を持つ白の１/１の吸血鬼・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。

foreignNames.name: 군단의 상륙 // 최초의 요새, 아단토
foreignNames.text:
(군단의 상륙에서 변신함)
{T}: {W}를 당신의 마나풀에 담는다.
{2}{W}, {T}: 생명연결을 가진 1/1 백색 흡혈귀 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.

foreignNames.name: Desembarque da Legião // Adanto, o Primeiro Forte
foreignNames.text:
(Transformação de Desembarque da Legião.)
{T}: Adicione {W} à sua reserva de mana.
{2}{W}, {T}: Crie uma ficha de criatura branca 1/1 do tipo Vampiro com vínculo com a vida.

foreignNames.name: Высадка Легиона // Аданто, Первый Форт
foreignNames.text:
(Трансформируется из Высадки Легиона.)
{T}: добавьте {W} в ваше хранилище маны.
{2}{W}, {T}: создайте одну фишку существа 1/1 белый Вампир с Цепью жизни.

foreignNames.name: 军团登陆 // 首砦艾唐托
foreignNames.text:
（由军团登陆转化。）
{T}：加{W}到你的法术力池中。
{2}{W}，{T}：派出一个1/1白色，具系命异能的吸血鬼衍生生物。

foreignNames.name: 軍團登陸 // 首砦艾唐托
foreignNames.text:
（由軍團登陸轉化。）
{T}：加{W}到你的魔法力池中。
{2}{W}，{T}：派出一個1/1白色，具繫命異能的吸血鬼衍生生物。

originalText:
(Transforms from Legion's Landing.)
{T}: Add {W} to your mana pool.
{2}{W}, {T}: Create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

name: Looming Altisaur
flavor: Nature can't be tamed, but the Sun Empire believes that humans are made stronger when they test themselves against the wild strength of the dinosaurs.

foreignNames.name: Gigantischer Altisaurus
foreignNames.flavor: Die Natur kann nicht gezähmt werden, doch das Imperium der Sonne glaubt, dass die Menschen stärker werden, wenn sie ihre Kräfte mit denen wilder Dinosaurier messen.

foreignNames.name: Altisaurio amenazante
foreignNames.flavor: Es imposible domar la naturaleza, pero el Imperio del Sol cree que los humanos se vuelven más fuertes si se ponen a prueba frente a la fuerza salvaje de los dinosaurios.

foreignNames.name: Altisaure surgissant
foreignNames.flavor: La nature ne peut être domptée, mais l'Empire du Soleil croit que les humains deviennent plus forts quand ils se mesurent à la force sauvage des dinosaures.

foreignNames.name: Altisauro Torreggiante
foreignNames.flavor: La natura non può essere domata, ma l'Impero del Sole crede che, se messi alla prova contro la forza selvaggia dei dinosauri, gli umani ne escano rafforzati.

foreignNames.name: 聳えるアルティサウルス
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 恐竜
foreignNames.flavor: 自然を飼い慣らすことはできないが、恐竜の野生の力に立ち向かうことで人間は一層強くなれると、太陽帝国では信じられている。

foreignNames.name: 무시무시한 알티사우루스
foreignNames.flavor: 자연을 길들일 수는 없지만, 태양 제국은 인간이 공룡들의 강력한 힘에 맞서 자신을 시험할 때 더 강해진다고 믿는다.

foreignNames.name: Altissauro Assomador
foreignNames.flavor: A natureza não pode ser domada, mas o Império do Sol acredita que os humanos se fazem mais fortes quando se provam contra a força selvagem dos dinossauros.

foreignNames.name: Возвышающийся Альтизавр
foreignNames.flavor: Природу нельзя укротить, но в Империи Солнца верят: люди становятся сильнее, испытывая себя в борьбе с необузданными динозаврами.

foreignNames.name: 掷影硕伟龙
foreignNames.flavor: 虽然无法驯服自然，但烈阳帝国相信人类只要敢于挑战恐龙蛮荒之力，以此考验自己，就能变得更加强壮。

foreignNames.name: 擲影碩偉龍
foreignNames.flavor: 雖然無法馴服自然，但烈陽帝國相信人類只要敢於挑戰恐龍蠻荒之力，以此考驗自己，就能變得更加強壯。

name: Mavren Fein, Dusk Apostle
text: Whenever one or more nontoken Vampires you control attack, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.
flavor: In the rapture of his Blood Fast, he destroyed the navigator's tools and steered the ship to shore by faith alone.

rulings.text: Once you attack with one or more nontoken Vampires, Mavren Fein’s ability will create a Vampire token even if some or all of those Vampires leave the battlefield or are removed from combat.

foreignNames.name: Mavren Fein, Apostel des Zwielichts
foreignNames.text: Immer wenn ein oder mehrere Nichtspielstein-Vampire, die du kontrollierst, angreifen, erzeuge einen 1/1 weißen Vampir-Kreaturenspielstein mit Lebensverknüpfung.
foreignNames.flavor: Im Wahn seiner Blutentsagung zerstörte er die Gerätschaften des Navigators und steuerte das Schiff nur von seinem Glauben getrieben bis an die Küste.

foreignNames.name: Mavren Fein, apóstol del Crepúsculo
foreignNames.text: Siempre que uno o más Vampiros que no sean fichas y que controlas ataquen, crea una ficha de criatura Vampiro blanca 1/1 con la habilidad de vínculo vital.
foreignNames.flavor: En el éxtasis de su Ayuno de Sangre, destruyó las herramientas de navegación y condujo a su barco hasta tierra por la fuerza de la fe.

foreignNames.name: Mavren Fein, Apôtre du crépuscule
foreignNames.text: À chaque fois qu'au moins un vampire non-jeton que vous contrôlez attaque, créez un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche Vampire avec le lien de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: Dans l'extase de son jeûne de sang, il détruisit les instruments de navigation et laissa sa seule foi guider le bateau jusqu'au rivage.

foreignNames.name: Mavren Fein, Apostolo del Vespro
foreignNames.text: Ogniqualvolta uno o più Vampiri non pedina che controlli attaccano, crea una pedina creatura Vampiro 1/1 bianca con legame vitale.
foreignNames.flavor: Nell'estasi della sua Astensione dal sangue, distrusse gli strumenti di navigazione e portò la nave a riva puramente per grazia della fede.

foreignNames.name: 薄暮の使徒、マーブレン・フェイン
foreignNames.text: あなたがコントロールしていてトークンでない吸血鬼が１体以上攻撃するたび、絆魂を持つ白の１/１の吸血鬼・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。
foreignNames.type: 伝説のクリーチャー — 吸血鬼・クレリック
foreignNames.flavor: 断血による恍惚感の中、彼は航法器具をすべて破壊すると、信仰心のみを頼りに船の舵を取った。

foreignNames.name: 황혼의 사도 마브렌 페인
foreignNames.text: 당신이 조종하는 토큰이 아닌 흡혈귀가 한 개 이상 공격할 때마다, 생명연결을 가진 1/1 백색 흡혈귀 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
foreignNames.flavor: 그는 금혈의 황홀감 속에서 항해사의 장비를 파괴하고는 믿음에만 의지한 채 배를 해안가로 몰았다.

foreignNames.name: Mavren Fein, Apóstolo do Crepúsculo
foreignNames.text: Toda vez que um ou mais Vampiros que você controla que não sejam fichas atacarem, crie uma ficha de criatura branca 1/1 do tipo Vampiro com vínculo com a vida.
foreignNames.flavor: No arrebatamento de seu Jejum de Sangue, ele destruiu os instrumentos do navegador e guiou a embarcação até a costa somente pela fé.

foreignNames.name: Маврен Фейн, Апостол Заката
foreignNames.text: Каждый раз, когда один или несколько не являющихся фишками Вампиров под вашим контролем атакует, создайте одну фишку существа 1/1 белый Вампир с Цепью жизни.
foreignNames.flavor: В экстазе Кровавого Поста он разломал инструменты навигатора и привел корабль к берегу, руководствуясь одной лишь верой.

foreignNames.name: 暮影宗徒马仁费恩
foreignNames.text: 每当一个或数个由你操控且非衍生物的吸血鬼攻击时，派出一个1/1白色，具系命异能的吸血鬼衍生生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 他在血禁仪式引致的兴奋状态下，抛弃了所有领航工具，单靠信念驾驶舰船靠岸。

foreignNames.name: 暮影宗徒馬仁費恩
foreignNames.text: 每當一個或數個由你操控且非衍生物的吸血鬼攻擊時，派出一個1/1白色，具繫命異能的吸血鬼衍生生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 他在血禁儀式引致的興奮狀態下，拋棄了所有領航工具，單靠信念駕駛艦船靠岸。

originalText: Whenever one or more nontoken Vampires you control attack, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

name: Paladin of the Bloodstained
text: When Paladin of the Bloodstained enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.
flavor: Closely linked to the Church of Dusk, the paladins of the Bloodstained order are devout to the point of fanaticism.

foreignNames.name: Paladin der Blutbesudelten
foreignNames.text: Wenn der Paladin der Blutbesudelten ins Spiel kommt, erzeuge einen 1/1 weißen Vampir-Kreaturenspielstein mit Lebensverknüpfung.
foreignNames.flavor: Die Paladine des Ordens der Blutbesudelten sind der Kirche des Zwielichts auf eine Art und Weise treu ergeben, die an Fanatismus grenzt.

foreignNames.name: Paladín de los Ensangrentados
foreignNames.text: Cuando el Paladín de los Ensangrentados entre al campo de batalla, crea una ficha de criatura Vampiro blanca 1/1 con la habilidad de vínculo vital.
foreignNames.flavor: Los paladines de la orden de los Ensangrentados están muy próximos a la Iglesia del Crepúsculo y su devoción alcanza el fanatismo.

foreignNames.name: Paladine des Sanguinolents
foreignNames.text: Quand la Paladine des Sanguinolents arrive sur le champ de bataille, créez un jeton de créature 1/1 blanche Vampire avec le lien de vie.
foreignNames.flavor: La dévotion des paladins de l'ordre des Sanguinolents, proches de l'Église du crépuscule, s'apparente au fanatisme.

foreignNames.name: Paladina degli Insanguinati
foreignNames.text: Quando la Paladina degli Insanguinati entra nel campo di battaglia, crea una pedina creatura Vampiro 1/1 bianca con legame vitale.
foreignNames.flavor: I paladini dell'ordine degli Insanguinati, strettamente legato alla Chiesa del Vespro, sono devoti fino al fanatismo.

foreignNames.name: 血潮隊の聖騎士
foreignNames.text: 血潮隊の聖騎士が戦場に出たとき、絆魂を持つ白の１/１の吸血鬼・クリーチャー・トークンを１体生成する。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 吸血鬼・騎士
foreignNames.flavor: 血潮隊の聖騎士たちは薄暮教会と密接な関係を持ち、言わば狂信的にその身を捧げている。

foreignNames.name: 핏자국 기사단의 성기사
foreignNames.text: 핏자국 기사단의 성기사가 전장에 들어올 때, 생명연결을 가진 1/1 백색 흡혈귀 생물 토큰 한 개를 만든다.
foreignNames.flavor: 황혼의 교회와 밀접하게 연관된 핏자국 기사단의 성기사들은 광신도에 가까울 만큼 독실하다.

foreignNames.name: Paladina da Mancha-de-Sangue
foreignNames.text: Quando Paladina da Mancha-de-Sangue entrar no campo de batalha, crie uma ficha de criatura branca 1/1 do tipo Vampiro com vínculo com a vida.
foreignNames.flavor: Intimamente ligados à Igreja do Crepúsculo, os paladinos da ordem Mancha-de-Sangue são devotos ao ponto do fanatismo.

foreignNames.name: Паладин Запятнанных Кровью
foreignNames.text: Когда Паладин Запятнанных Кровью выходит на поле битвы, создайте одну фишку существа 1/1 белый Вампир с Цепью жизни.
foreignNames.flavor: Тесно связанные с Церковью Заката паладины из ордена Запятнанных Кровью набожны до фанатизма.

foreignNames.name: 沥血团神圣武士
foreignNames.text: 当沥血团神圣武士进战场时，派出一个1/1白色，具系命异能的吸血鬼衍生生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 沥血骑士团与暮影教会联系紧密，麾下神圣武士个个如发狂一般献身教会。

foreignNames.name: 瀝血團神聖武士
foreignNames.text: 當瀝血團神聖武士進戰場時，派出一個1/1白色，具繫命異能的吸血鬼衍生生物。
foreignNames.flavor: 瀝血騎士團與暮影教會聯繫緊密，麾下神聖武士個個如發狂一般獻身教會。

originalText: When Paladin of the Bloodstained enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Vampire creature token with lifelink.

name: Pious Interdiction
text:
Enchant creature
When Pious Interdiction enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.
flavor: "Ours is the true and righteous path. You will bow before our might."

rulings.text: If the creature this Aura would enchant is an illegal target by the time Pious Interdiction resolves, the entire spell doesn’t resolve. It won’t enter the battlefield, so its ability won’t trigger.

foreignNames.name: Auferlegtes Dogma
foreignNames.text:
Verzaubert eine Kreatur
Wenn das Auferlegte Dogma ins Spiel kommt, erhältst du 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.
Die verzauberte Kreatur kann nicht angreifen oder blocken.
foreignNames.flavor: „Wir wandeln auf dem Pfad der Gerechten und du wirst dich unserem Willen beugen."

foreignNames.name: Interdicción devota
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura.
Cuando la Interdicción devota entre al campo de batalla, ganas 2 vidas.
La criatura encantada no puede atacar ni bloquear.
foreignNames.flavor: "El nuestro es el único camino justo y verdadero. Se arrodillarán ante nuestro poder".

foreignNames.name: Interdiction pieuse
foreignNames.text:
Enchanter : créature
Quand l'Interdiction pieuse arrive sur le champ de bataille, vous gagnez 2 points de vie.
La créature enchantée ne peut ni attaquer ni bloquer.
foreignNames.flavor: « Seule notre voie est droite et vertueuse. Prosternez-vous devant notre puissance."

foreignNames.name: Pia Interdizione
foreignNames.text:
Incanta creatura
Quando la Pia Interdizione entra nel campo di battaglia, guadagni 2 punti vita.
La creatura incantata non può attaccare o bloccare.
foreignNames.flavor: "Nostra è la via della verità e della giustizia. Inchinati dinanzi al nostro potere."

foreignNames.name: 崇高な阻止
foreignNames.text:
エンチャント（クリーチャー）
崇高な阻止が戦場に出たとき、あなたは２点のライフを得る。
エンチャントされているクリーチャーでは攻撃したりブロックしたりできない。
foreignNames.type: エンチャント — オーラ
foreignNames.flavor: 「我らこそが真実にして正義である。我らの前に頭を垂れるのだ。」

foreignNames.name: 경건한 차단
foreignNames.text:
생물에게 부여
경건한 차단이 전장에 들어올 때, 당신은 생명 2점을 얻는다.
부여된 생물은 공격하거나 방어할 수 없다.
foreignNames.flavor: "우리의 길이 진실되고 정의로운 길이다. 너희는 우리의 힘 앞에 엎드릴 것이다."

foreignNames.name: Interdição Pia
foreignNames.text:
Encantar criatura
Quando Interdição Pia entra no campo de batalha, você ganha 2 pontos de vida.
A criatura encantada não pode atacar nem bloquear.
foreignNames.flavor: "Nosso caminho é o verdadeiro e reto. Você se curvará perante nosso poder."

foreignNames.name: Праведный Запрет
foreignNames.text:
Зачаровать существо
Когда Праведный Запрет выходит на поле битвы, вы получаете 2 жизни.
Зачарованное существо не может атаковать или блокировать.
foreignNames.flavor: «Наш путь есть путь истины и добродетели. Ты склонишься перед нашим могуществом».

foreignNames.name: 虔诚禁制
foreignNames.text:
结附于生物
当虔诚禁制进战场时，你获得2点生命。
所结附的生物不能进行攻击或阻挡。
foreignNames.flavor: 「吾等才为世间正道。汝将屈服于吾人之力。」

foreignNames.name: 虔誠禁制
foreignNames.text:
結附於生物
當虔誠禁制進戰場時，你獲得2點生命。
所結附的生物不能進行攻擊或阻擋。
foreignNames.flavor: 「吾等才為世間正道。汝將屈服於吾人之力。」

originalText:
Enchant creature
When Pious Interdiction enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life.
Enchanted creature can't attack or block.

name: Priest of the Wakening Sun
text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand. If you do, you gain 2 life.
{3}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Priest of the Wakening Sun: Search your library for a Dinosaur card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

rulings.text: You don’t choose whether to reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand until the triggered ability of Priest of the Wakening Sun resolves. You may respond to the triggered ability by taking an action to get a Dinosaur card into your hand, such as activating its second ability.
While resolving Priest of the Wakening Sun’s triggered ability, you can’t reveal multiple Dinosaur cards to gain more life.
You can reveal the same Dinosaur card for multiple Priests of the Wakening Sun or for the same one over multiple turns.

If an effect refers to a “[subtype] spell” or “[subtype] card,” it refers only to a spell or card that has that subtype. For example, March of the Drowned is a card that benefits Pirates and features Pirates in its illustration, but it isn’t a Pirate card.

foreignNames.name: Priester der Erwachenden Sonne
foreignNames.text:
Zu Beginn deines Versorgungssegments kannst du eine Dinosaurier-Karte aus deiner Hand offen vorzeigen. Falls du dies tust, erhältst du 2 Lebenspunkte dazu.
{3}{W}{W}, opfere den Priester der Erwachenden Sonne: Durchsuche deine Bibliothek nach einer Dinosaurier-Karte, zeige sie offen vor, nimm sie auf deine Hand und mische dann deine Bibliothek.

foreignNames.name: Sacerdote del Sol Albo
foreignNames.text:
Al comienzo de tu mantenimiento, puedes mostrar una carta de Dinosaurio de tu mano. Si lo haces, ganas 2 vidas.
{3}{W}{W}, sacrificar al Sacerdote del Sol Albo: Busca en tu biblioteca una carta de Dinosaurio, muéstrala y ponla en tu mano. Luego baraja tu biblioteca.

foreignNames.name: Prêtre du Soleil levant
foreignNames.text:
Au début de votre entretien, vous pouvez révéler une carte de dinosaure de votre main. Si vous faites ainsi, vous gagnez 2 points de vie.
{3}{W}{W}, sacrifiez le Prêtre du Soleil levant : Cherchez dans votre bibliothèque une carte de dinosaure, révélez-la, mettez-la dans votre main et mélangez ensuite votre bibliothèque.

foreignNames.name: Sacerdote del Sole Sorgente
foreignNames.text:
All'inizio del tuo mantenimento, puoi rivelare una carta Dinosauro dalla tua mano. Se lo fai, guadagni 2 punti vita.
{3}{W}{W}, Sacrifica il Sacerdote del Sole Sorgente: Passa in rassegna il tuo grimorio per una carta Dinosauro, rivelala e aggiungila alla tua mano, poi rimescola il tuo grimorio.

foreignNames.name: 覚醒の太陽の神官
foreignNames.text:
あなたのアップキープの開始時に、あなたはあなたの手札から恐竜・カード１枚を公開してもよい。そうしたなら、あなたは２点のライフを得る。
{3}{W}{W}, 覚醒の太陽の神官を生け贄に捧げる：あなたのライブラリーから恐竜・カード１枚を探し、それを公開してあなたの手札に加え、その後あなたのライブラリーを切り直す。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 人間・クレリック

foreignNames.name: 일깨우는 태양의 사제
foreignNames.text:
당신의 유지단 시작에, 당신은 당신의 손에 있는 공룡 카드 한 장을 공개할 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 당신은 생명 2점을 얻는다.
{3}{W}{W}, 일깨우는 태양의 사제를 희생한다: 당신의 서고에서 공룡 카드 한 장을 찾아 공개하고 당신의 손으로 가져간 후, 당신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreignNames.name: Sacerdote do Sol Nascente
foreignNames.text:
No inicio de sua manutenção, você pode revelar um card de Dinossauro de sua mão. Se fizer isso, você ganhará 2 pontos de vida.
{3}{W}{W}, sacrifique Sacerdote do Sol Nascente: Procure um card de Dinossauro em seu grimório, revele-o, coloque-o em sua mão e, depois, embaralhe seu grimório.

foreignNames.name: Жрец Пробуждающего Солнца
foreignNames.text:
В начале вашего шага поддержки вы можете показать карту Динозавра из вашей руки. Если вы это делаете, вы получаете 2 жизни.
{3}{W}{W}, пожертвуйте Жреца Пробуждающего Солнца: найдите в вашей библиотеке карту Динозавра, покажите ее, положите ее в вашу руку, затем перетасуйте вашу библиотеку.

foreignNames.name: 晓阳僧侣
foreignNames.text:
在你的维持开始时，你可以从你手上展示一张恐龙牌。若你如此作，则你获得2点生命。
{3}{W}{W}，牺牲晓阳僧侣：从你的牌库中搜寻一张恐龙牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后将你的牌库洗牌。

foreignNames.name: 曉陽僧侶
foreignNames.text:
在你的維持開始時，你可以從你手上展示一張恐龍牌。若你如此作，則你獲得2點生命。
{3}{W}{W}，犧牲曉陽僧侶：從你的牌庫中搜尋一張恐龍牌，展示該牌，將它置於你手上，然後將你的牌庫洗牌。

originalText:
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may reveal a Dinosaur card from your hand. If you do, you gain 2 life.
{3}{W}{W}, Sacrifice Priest of the Wakening Sun: Search your library for a Dinosaur card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

name: Pterodon Knight

flavor: "To rise like the sun—there is no greater feeling."

foreignNames.flavor: „Es gibt kein erhabeneres Gefühl als aufzusteigen wie die Sonne."

name: Sanguine Sacrament
text: You gain twice X life. Put Sanguine Sacrament on the bottom of its owner's library.
flavor: "As the sun sets to make way for dawn, so we turn to darkness to bring about the coming salvation."

rulings.text: Sanguine Sacrament causes you to gain an amount of life equal to twice the number chosen for X as a single life-gain event. An ability that triggers “Whenever you gain life” will trigger only once.

foreignNames.flavor: «Как садится солнце, чтобы начать путь к рассвету, так и мы обращаемся к тьме, чтобы приблизить грядущее спасение».

foreignNames.name: 血色圣礼
foreignNames.text: 你获得两倍于X的生命。将血色圣礼置于其拥有者的牌库底。
foreignNames.flavor: 「夕阳落下迎接破晓，正如吾人投身黑暗带来救赎。」

foreignNames.name: 血色聖禮
foreignNames.text: 你獲得兩倍於X的生命。將血色聖禮置於其擁有者的牌庫底。
foreignNames.flavor: 「夕陽落下迎接破曉，正如吾人投身黑暗帶來救贖。」

originalText: You gain twice X life. Put Sanguine Sacrament on the bottom of its owner's library.

name: Settle the Wreckage
text: Exile all attacking creatures target player controls. That player may search their library for that many basic land cards, put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

rulings.text: Settle the Wreckage targets only the player. Creatures with hexproof that player controls will be exiled as this spell resolves.
That player can find fewer basic land cards than the number of exiled creatures, whether because they want to or because they don’t have that many basic land cards left.

The number of lands that player may find is the number of attacking creatures that were exiled, even if some of those creatures were tokens, weren’t creature cards, or didn’t end up in exile (most likely because one was that player’s commander in the Commander variant).

foreignNames.name: Schiffbruch erleiden
foreignNames.text: Schicke alle angreifenden Kreaturen, die ein Spieler deiner Wahl kontrolliert, ins Exil. Der Spieler kann seine Bibliothek nach entsprechend vielen Standardland-Karten durchsuchen, diese getappt ins Spiel bringen und dann seine Bibliothek mischen.

foreignNames.name: Naufragio consumado
foreignNames.text: Exilia todas las criaturas atacantes que controla el jugador objetivo. Ese jugador puede buscar en su biblioteca esa misma cantidad de cartas de tierra básica, ponerlas en el campo de batalla giradas y luego barajar su biblioteca.

foreignNames.name: Aménagement des décombres
foreignNames.text: Exilez toutes les créatures attaquantes que le joueur ciblé contrôle. Ce joueur peut chercher dans sa bibliothèque autant de cartes de terrain de base, les mettre sur le champ de bataille engagées et mélanger ensuite sa bibliothèque.

foreignNames.name: Incagliare il Relitto
foreignNames.text: Esilia tutte le creature attaccanti controllate da un giocatore bersaglio. Quel giocatore può passare in rassegna il suo grimorio per altrettante carte terra base, metterle sul campo di battaglia TAPpate, poi rimescolare il suo grimorio.

foreignNames.name: 残骸の漂着
foreignNames.text: プレイヤー１人を対象とし、そのプレイヤーがコントロールしている攻撃クリーチャーをすべて追放する。そのプレイヤーは自分のライブラリーから、その数に等しい枚数の基本土地・カードを探してもよい。そうしたなら、そのプレイヤーはそれらのカードをタップ状態で戦場に出し、その後自分のライブラリーを切り直す。

foreignNames.name: 잔해 가라앉히기
foreignNames.text: 플레이어를 목표로 정한다. 그 플레이어가 조종하는 공격 중인 생물을 모두 추방한다. 그 플레이어는 추방된 생물의 수만큼 자신의 서고에서 기본 대지 카드를 찾아 탭된 채로 전장에 놓을 수 있다. 그렇게 한다면, 그 플레이어는 자신의 서고를 섞는다.

foreignNames.name: Assentar nos Destroços
foreignNames.text: Exile todas as criaturas atacantes que o jogador alvo controla. Aquele jogador pode procurar no próprio grimório aquela quantidade de cards de terreno básico, colocá-los no campo de batalha virados, e depois embaralhar o próprio grimório.

foreignNames.name: Подстроенное Крушение
foreignNames.text: Изгоните все атакующие существа под контролем целевого игрока. Тот игрок может найти в своей библиотеке такое же количество карт базовых земель, положить те карты на поле битвы повернутыми, затем перетасовать свою библиотеку.

foreignNames.name: 处理残迹
foreignNames.text: 选择目标牌手。放逐所有由该牌手操控且进行攻击的生物。该牌手可以从其牌库中搜寻等量的基本地牌，将这些牌横置放进战场，然后将其牌库洗牌。

foreignNames.name: 處理殘跡
foreignNames.text: 選擇目標玩家。放逐所有由該玩家操控且進行攻擊的生物。該玩家可以從其牌庫中搜尋等量的基本地牌，將之橫置放進戰場，然後將其牌庫洗牌。

originalText: Exile all attacking creatures target player controls. That player may search his or her library for that many basic land cards, put those cards onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle his or her library.

name: Sheltering Light
text: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Scry 1. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy the creature.)
flavor: Those who wield the power of the sun protect the Empire from darkness.

foreignNames.name: Schützendes Licht
foreignNames.text: Eine Kreatur deiner Wahl erhält Unzerstörbarkeit bis zum Ende des Zuges. Hellsicht 1. (Schaden und Effekte, die „zerstören", zerstören die Kreatur nicht.)
foreignNames.flavor: Jene, die über die Macht der Sonne verfügen, schützen das Imperium vor der Dunkelheit.

foreignNames.name: Luz protectora
foreignNames.text: La criatura objetivo gana la habilidad de indestructible hasta el final del turno. Adivina 1. (El daño y los efectos que dicen "destruir" no destruyen a la criatura.)
foreignNames.flavor: Aquellos que tienen el poder del sol protegen de la oscuridad al Imperio.

foreignNames.name: Lumière protectrice
foreignNames.text: La créature ciblée acquiert l'indestructible jusqu'à la fin du tour. Regard 1. (Les blessures et les effets qui disent « détruisez » ne détruisent pas la créature.)
foreignNames.flavor: Ceux qui brandissent la puissance du soleil protègent l'Empire contre les ténèbres.

foreignNames.name: Luce Tutelare
foreignNames.text: Una creatura bersaglio ha indistruttibile fino alla fine del turno. Profetizza 1. (Il danno e gli effetti che dicono "distruggi" non distruggono quella creatura.)
foreignNames.flavor: Coloro che dominano il potere del sole proteggono l'Impero dall'oscurità.

foreignNames.name: 防護の光
foreignNames.text: クリーチャー１体を対象とする。ターン終了時まで、それは破壊不能を得る。占術１を行う。（ダメージや「破壊」と書かれた効果では、そのクリーチャーは破壊されない。）
foreignNames.flavor: 太陽の力を携えた者が帝国を闇から守るであろう。

foreignNames.name: 보호의 빛
foreignNames.text: 생물을 목표로 정한다. 그 생물은 턴종료까지 무적을 얻는다. 점술 1을 한다. (이 생물은 피해나 "파괴"라고 명시된 효과에 의해 파괴되지 않는다.)
foreignNames.flavor: 태양의 힘을 휘두르는 자들은 어둠으로부터 제국을 보호한다.

foreignNames.name: Luz Acolhedora
foreignNames.text: A criatura alvo ganha indestrutível até o final do turno. Vidência 1. (Dano e efeitos que dizem "destrua" não destroem a criatura.)
foreignNames.flavor: Os que empunham o poder do sol protegem o Império contra a escuridão.

foreignNames.name: Укрывающий Свет
foreignNames.text: Целевое существо получает Неразрушимость до конца хода. Предскажите 1. (Повреждения и эффекты с указанием «уничтожьте» не уничтожают то существо.)
foreignNames.flavor: Те, кто получил силу солнца, защищают Империю от тьмы.

foreignNames.name: 庇护光盾
foreignNames.text: 目标生物获得不灭异能直到回合结束。占卜1。（伤害与注明「消灭」的效应不会将该生物消灭。）
foreignNames.flavor: 善使烈阳之力者保卫帝国免遭黑暗侵袭。

foreignNames.name: 庇護光盾
foreignNames.text: 目標生物獲得不滅異能直到回合結束。占卜1。（傷害與註明「消滅」的效應不會將該生物消滅。）
foreignNames.flavor: 善使烈陽之力者保衛帝國免遭黑暗侵襲。

originalText: Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. Scry 1. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy the creature.)

name: Shining Aerosaur
text: Flying
flavor:
"The invaders cloak themselves in the shadows of dusk. Aerosaurs hide in the brilliance of the noonday sun."
—Caparocti Sunborn

foreignNames.name: Gleißender Aerosaurus
foreignNames.text: Fliegend
foreignNames.flavor: „Die Eindringlinge verbergen sich in den Schatten der Dämmerung. Aerosaurier verbergen sich im gleißenden Licht der Mittagssonne." —Caparocti, Sohn der Sonne

foreignNames.name: Aerosaurio resplandeciente
foreignNames.text: Vuela.
foreignNames.flavor: "Los invasores se ocultan en las sombras del crepúsculo. Los aerosaurios se esconden bajo el fulgor del sol de mediodía". —Caparocti, Nacido del Sol

foreignNames.name: Aérosaure étincelant
foreignNames.text: Vol
foreignNames.flavor: « Les envahisseurs s'enveloppent dans les ombres du crépuscule. Les aérosaures se cachent dans l'éclat du soleil à son zénith. » —Caparocti, Fils du soleil

foreignNames.name: Aerosauro Scintillante
foreignNames.text: Volare
foreignNames.flavor: "Gli invasori si ammantano delle ombre del vespro. Gli aerosauri si nascondono nel riverbero del sole a mezzogiorno." —Caparocti Figlio del Sole

foreignNames.name: 輝くエアロサウルス
foreignNames.text: 飛行
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 恐竜
foreignNames.flavor: 「侵略者は薄暮の暗がりに隠れる。エアロサウルスは白昼の太陽の輝きに隠れる。」 ――カパロクティ・サンボーン

foreignNames.name: 빛나는 에어로사우루스
foreignNames.text: 비행
foreignNames.flavor: "침략자들은 황혼의 그림자 속에 몸을 숨기고, 에어로사우루스는 한낮의 태양 빛 속에 몸을 감춘다." —태양의 아들 카파록티

foreignNames.name: Aerossauro Reluzente
foreignNames.text: Voar
foreignNames.flavor: "Os invasores camuflam-se nas sombras do crepúsculo. Os aerossauros ocultam-se no brilho do sol do meio dia." — Caparocti, Filho do Sol

foreignNames.name: Блестящий Аэрозавр
foreignNames.text: Полет
foreignNames.flavor: «Захватчики укрываются закатными тенями. Аэрозавры же прячутся в сиянии полуденного солнца». — Капарокти Солнцерожденный

foreignNames.name: 耀日翔翼龙
foreignNames.text: 飞行
foreignNames.flavor: 「入侵者拿暮影作掩护。翔翼龙用烈阳藏行踪。」 ～炫日卡帕罗提

foreignNames.name: 耀日翔翼龍
foreignNames.text: 飛行
foreignNames.flavor: 「入侵者拿暮影作掩護。翔翼龍用烈陽藏行蹤。」 ～炫日卡帕羅提

originalText: Flying

name: Skyblade of the Legion
text: Flying
flavor: Vampires call the gift of flight "exultation." For their enemies, it brings only sorrow.

foreignNames.name: Himmelsklinge der Legion
foreignNames.text: Fliegend
foreignNames.flavor: Vampire nennen das Geschenk des Fliegens ein „Hochgefühl". In ihren Feinden weckt es nur blanke Panik.

foreignNames.name: Filoceleste de la Legión
foreignNames.text: Vuela.
foreignNames.flavor: Los vampiros llaman "exultación" al don de volar. Para sus enemigos solo trae lamentaciones.

foreignNames.name: Lameciel de la Légion
foreignNames.text: Vol
foreignNames.flavor: Les vampires appellent la possibilité de voler « l'exultation ». Pour leurs ennemis, elle est synonyme de tourment.

foreignNames.name: Lama Celeste della Legione
foreignNames.text: Volare
foreignNames.flavor: I vampiri chiamano il dono del volo "esultanza", ma per i loro nemici è solo causa di sofferenza.

foreignNames.name: 軍団の飛び刃
foreignNames.text: 飛行
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 吸血鬼・兵士
foreignNames.flavor: 吸血鬼は飛行の才能を「歓喜」と呼ぶ。敵からすれば、それは悲哀でしかない。

foreignNames.name: 군단의 하늘검사
foreignNames.text: 비행
foreignNames.flavor: 흡혈귀들은 비행의 재능을 "기쁨"이라고 부른다. 이는 적들에게는 슬픔만을 가져온다.

foreignNames.name: Lâmina Celeste da Legião
foreignNames.text: Voar
foreignNames.flavor: Os vampiros chamam o dom do voo de "exultação". Para seus inimigos, ele traz somente pesar.

foreignNames.name: Небесный Клинок Легиона
foreignNames.text: Полет
foreignNames.flavor: Вампиры называют дар полета ликованием. Их врагам же он несет лишь горе.

foreignNames.name: 军团天刃兵
foreignNames.text: 飞行
foreignNames.flavor: 吸血鬼将飞空之力称为「欢腾」之力。但对敌人来说，则是悲伤之源。

foreignNames.name: 軍團天刃兵
foreignNames.text: 飛行
foreignNames.flavor: 吸血鬼將飛空之力稱為「歡騰」之力。但對敵人來說，則是悲傷之源。

originalText: Flying

name: Slash of Talons
text: Slash of Talons deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.
flavor:
"The amber sun smokes with fury, gazing on foes that gather like ants invading our home. We are ready! Blade and claw strike as one."
—Huatli

foreignNames.name: Klauenhieb
foreignNames.text: Der Klauenhieb fügt einer angreifenden oder blockenden Kreatur deiner Wahl 2 Schadenspunkte zu.
foreignNames.flavor: „Die bernsteinfarbene Sonne brennt mit Zorn auf unsere Feinde nieder, die unsere Heimat wie ein Heuschreckenschwarm überfallen. Sollen sie nur kommen! Unsere Klauen und Klingen sind bereit." —Huatli

foreignNames.name: Clavar las garras
foreignNames.text: Clavar las garras hace 2 puntos de daño a la criatura atacante o bloqueadora objetivo.
foreignNames.flavor: "El sol ámbar se consume en llamaradas de furia mientras contempla a los enemigos, que se agrupan como hormigas invasoras frente a nuestro hogar. ¡Estamos listos! El filo y la garra golpearán unidos". —Huatli

foreignNames.name: Balafre de serres
foreignNames.text: La Balafre de serres inflige 2 blessures à la créature attaquante ou bloqueuse ciblée.
foreignNames.flavor: « Le soleil d'ambre écume de rage, fixant son regard sur ceux qui se regroupent tels des fourmis pour envahir nos contrées. Nous sommes prêts ! Nos lames et nos griffes s'abattent à l'unisson. » —Huatli

foreignNames.name: Falciata di Artigli
foreignNames.text: La Falciata di Artigli infligge 2 danni a una creatura attaccante o bloccante bersaglio.
foreignNames.flavor: "Il sole ambrato ribolle di furia osservando il nemico che brulica come formiche intente a invadere la nostra casa. Ma noi siamo pronti! Lama e artiglio colpiscono insieme." —Huatli

foreignNames.name: 鉤爪の切りつけ
foreignNames.text: 攻撃クリーチャー１体かブロック・クリーチャー１体を対象とする。鉤爪の切りつけはそれに２点のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.flavor: 「琥珀色の太陽が怒りに煙っている。アリのように群がる侵略者どもを睨みつけている。いつでも行けるわ！刃と爪の同時攻撃よ。」 ――ファートリ

foreignNames.name: 발톱의 난도질
foreignNames.text: 공격 중이거나 방어 중인 생물을 목표로 정한다. 발톱의 난도질은 그 생물에게 피해 2점을 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: "주황빛 태양이 분노를 내뿜으며, 개미떼처럼 쳐들어오는 적들을 노려본다. 준비는 끝났다! 칼날과 발톱이 하나 되어 적들을 공격한다." —화틀리

foreignNames.name: Ceifada de Garras
foreignNames.text: Ceifada de Garras causa 2 pontos de dano à criatura atacante ou bloqueadora alvo.
foreignNames.flavor: "O sol de âmbar fumega furioso, mirando os inimigos que se agrupam como formigas invadindo nosso lar. Estamos prontos! Lâmina e garra atacam como uma só." — Huatli

foreignNames.name: Удар Когтями
foreignNames.text: Удар Когтями наносит 2 повреждения целевому атакующему или блокирующему существу.
foreignNames.flavor: «Янтарное солнце пышет яростью, глядя на врагов, скопившихся, словно муравьи, чтобы захватить наш дом. Мы готовы! Пусть как один ударят клинки и когти». — Уатли

foreignNames.name: 利爪挥斩
foreignNames.text: 利爪挥斩对目标进行攻击或阻挡的生物造成2点伤害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「太阳澄亮如珀，怒气四蕴，猛烈照射在入侵我们家园的蝼蚁上。我们已准备就绪！剑刃利爪同心出击。」 ～华特莉

foreignNames.name: 利爪揮斬
foreignNames.text: 利爪揮斬對目標進行攻擊或阻擋的生物造成2點傷害。
foreignNames.flavor: 「太陽澄亮如珀，怒氣四蘊，猛烈照射在入侵我們家園的螻蟻上。我們已準備就緒！劍刃利爪同心出擊。」 ～華特莉

originalText: Slash of Talons deals 2 damage to target attacking or blocking creature.

name: Steadfast Armasaur
text:
Vigilance
{1}{W}, {T}: Steadfast Armasaur deals damage equal to its toughness to target creature blocking or blocked by it.
flavor:
"Like the mighty armasaur, we will defend against all who invade our shores."
—Itzama the Crested

rulings.text: Tapping an attacking or blocking creature doesn’t remove it from combat. If the target of Steadfast Armasaur’s ability survives the damage, Steadfast Armasaur will deal combat damage to and be dealt combat damage by that creature as normal.
If Steadfast Armasaur is no longer on the battlefield as its ability resolves, use its toughness as it last existed on the battlefield to determine how damage is dealt.

foreignNames.name: Standhafter Armasaurus
foreignNames.text:
Wachsamkeit
{1}{W}, {T}: Der Standhafte Armasaurus fügt einer Kreatur deiner Wahl, die er blockt oder von der er geblockt wird, Schadenspunkte in Höhe seiner Widerstandskraft zu.
foreignNames.flavor: „Wir werden unsere Küsten mit derselben Entschlossenheit verteidigen, mit der sich ein Armasaurus verteidigt." —Itzama Knochenhaupt

foreignNames.name: Armasaurio tenaz
foreignNames.text:
Vigilancia.
{1}{W}, {T}: El Armasaurio tenaz hace una cantidad de daño igual a su resistencia a la criatura objetivo que lo bloquea o que es bloqueada por él.
foreignNames.flavor: "Como el poderoso armasaurio, nos defenderemos de todos los que invadan nuestras costas". —Itzama, la Crestada

foreignNames.name: Armosaure inébranlable
foreignNames.text:
Vigilance
{1}{W}, {T} : L'Armosaure inébranlable inflige un nombre de blessures égal à son endurance à une créature ciblée qui le bloque ou qui est bloquée par lui.
foreignNames.flavor: « Comme le puissant armosaure, nous résisterons face à tous ceux qui envahissent nos terres. » —Itzama la crêtée

foreignNames.name: Armasauro Risoluto
foreignNames.text:
Cautela
{1}{W}, {T}: L'Armasauro Risoluto infligge danno pari alla sua costituzione a una creatura bersaglio che blocca o che lo blocca.
foreignNames.flavor: "Come il possente armasauro, ci difenderemo da chiunque invada le nostre coste." —Itzama dalla Cresta

foreignNames.name: 不動のアルマサウルス
foreignNames.text:
警戒
{1}{W}, {T}：不動のアルマサウルスをブロックしているクリーチャー１体かこれにブロックされているクリーチャー１体を対象とする。不動のアルマサウルスはそれに、これのタフネスに等しい点数のダメージを与える。
foreignNames.type: クリーチャー — 恐竜
foreignNames.flavor: 「アルマサウルスのように力強く、この岸を侵す者どもから守り抜くのだ。」 ――冠羽のイザマ

foreignNames.name: 굳건한 아르마사우루스
foreignNames.text:
경계
{1}{W}, {T}: 굳건한 아르마사우르스를 방어하거나 굳건한 아르마사우루스에게 방어당하는 생물을 목표로 정한다. 굳건한 아르마사우루스는 그 생물에게 자신의 방어력만큼 피해를 입힌다.
foreignNames.flavor: "우리는 막강한 아르마사우루스처럼 해안을 침략하는 모든 적들을 막아낼 것이다." —갈기투구 이차마

foreignNames.name: Armassauro Resoluto
foreignNames.text:
Vigilância
{1}{W}, {T}: Armassauro Resoluto causa dano igual a sua resistência à criatura alvo que o esteja bloqueando ou seja bloqueada por ele.
foreignNames.flavor: "Como o poderoso armassauro, vamos nos defender de todos que ousarem invadir nosso litoral." — Itzama da Crista

foreignNames.name: Непоколебимый Армазавр
foreignNames.text:
Бдительность
{1}{W}, {T}: Непоколебимый Армазавр наносит количество повреждений, равное своей выносливости, целевому блокирующему его или заблокированному им существу.
foreignNames.flavor: «Как могучий армазавр, мы дадим отпор всем, кто посягнет на наши берега». — Ицама Гребненосная

foreignNames.name: 坚定悍扫龙
foreignNames.text:
警戒

name: Sunrise Seeker
text:
Vigilance
When Sunrise Seeker enters the battlefield, it explores. (Reveal the top card of your library. Put that card into your hand if it's a land. Otherwise, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature, then put the card back or put it into your graveyard.)

rulings.text: Once an ability that causes a creature to explore begins to resolve, no player may take any other actions until it’s done. Notably, opponents can’t try to remove the exploring creature after you reveal a nonland card but before it receives a counter.
If no card is revealed, most likely because that player’s library is empty, the exploring creature receives a +1/+1 counter.

If a resolving spell or ability instructs a specific creature to explore but that creature has left the battlefield, the creature still explores. If you reveal a nonland card this way, you won’t put a +1/+1 counter on anything, but you may put the revealed card into your graveyard. Effects that trigger “whenever a creature you control explores” trigger if appropriate.

name: Tocatli Honor Guard
text: Creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.
flavor: The glorious city of Pachatupa is the center of the Sun Empire, and Tocatli, the emperor's palace, is its glowing heart.

rulings.text: Triggered abilities use the word “when,” “whenever,” or “at.” They’re usually written as “[Trigger condition], [effect].”

Replacement effects, such as a permanent entering the battlefield tapped or with counters on it, are unaffected. Abilities that apply “as [this creature] enters the battlefield” are replacement effects.

Tocatli Honor Guard’s ability stops a creature’s own enters-the-battlefield triggered abilities as well as other triggered abilities that would trigger when a creature enters the battlefield. This includes abilities that would trigger when Tocatli Honor Guard itself enters the battlefield.

The trigger event doesn’t have to specify “creatures” entering the battlefield. For example, Contraband Kingpin has an ability that says “Whenever an artifact enters the battlefield under your control, scry 1.” If an artifact creature enters the battlefield under your control, that ability won’t trigger. If a noncreature artifact enters the battlefield under your control, the ability will trigger.

Look at the permanent as it exists on the battlefield, taking into account continuous effects, to determine whether any triggered abilities will trigger. For example, if you control March of the Machines, which says, in part, “Each noncreature artifact is an artifact creature,” each artifact will be a creature at the time it enters the battlefield and will not cause triggered abilities to trigger.
If Tocatli Honor Guard and another creature enter the battlefield at the same time, neither creature entering the battlefield will cause triggered abilities to trigger.
